name: Demolition Duck
description:
Demolition Duck is a game made in 24 hours for the University of Birmingham Game Development Society's Spring Jam 2021. 

Play as a duck with a knack for explosives.  Don't leave a single brick behind. Be the first airborne duck. 

  • A & D or Arrow keys for movement. 
  • Space to Jump
  • Use the mouse to aim and throw bombs
